verbs.description: scenarios - how the u s midterm elections [V: could] ripple through markets should his fellow republicans maintain or extend their grip on congress president donald trump may be emboldened to pursue more of his political agenda including further tax reforms investors are bracing for a split congress in which democrats win the house but republicans hold the senate a reflection of current polling data and online betting markets democrats in norway trump congress senate u s united states china democrats trump administration united states congress new york united states senate donald trump federal reserve new jersey elections house of representatives reuters united states house of representatives president donald trump citigroup
